robot_capabilities.lerobot1: A robotic arm with 5 DOF. It has a gripper (end effector) to hold items. The robot can pick and place objects and can show the objects.
robot_capabilities.lerobot2: A robotic arm with 5 DOF. It has a gripper (end effector) to hold items. The robot can pick and place objects and can show the objects.

robot_morphology.lerobot1: Payload: 500 g, Reach: 0.4 m, Degrees of Freedom: 5
robot_morphology.lerobot2: Payload: 500 g, Reach: 0.4 m, Degrees of Freedom: 5

task_specific_rules: lerobot1 must do tasks with red and white gears only.
lerobot2 must do tasks with yellow, green, greay, golden yellow and cream gears only.
